name: King's Quest 6: Heir Today Gone Tomorrow
name_original: King's Quest 6: Heir Today Gone Tomorrow
description:
King's Quest 6: Heir Today Gone Tomorrow is an adventure game developed by Sierra On-Line. It was originally released in 1992. Sierra On-Line published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
King's Quest 6: Heir Today Gone Tomorrow is available on PC.
